errors.missingType: 'type' property not set, to use the file adapter the adapter 'type' should be set to a valid adapter type.
errors.missingPath: 'path' property not set, A valid file path should be added to the config object
errors.incorrectAdapterType: Incorrect adapter type. Not set to type of 'console'.
errors.missingApplication: 'application' property not set, All log entries shold be mapped to an 'application.' Since multiple apps could potentially log to the same output stream.
errors.missingMachine: 'machine' property not set, All log entries shold be mapped to a 'machine' that they took place on. Since apps can be distributed and synced to the cloud we need to know which box this log took place on.
